topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53606ffd636872482d5f0100#post_53606ffd636872482d5f0100
[bq="twistedmetalero"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53606e3a6368727b6a530200#post_53606e3a6368727b6a530200
6
Huh, 70 mins, thats good.[/bq]
Lucky you; sometimes the larger hard drives take ages to clean.


Also if on a regular basis you want to make your computer run faster run bleachbit every week or two without the "free disk space" option.  The free disk space option is to overwrite unused space; everything else takes much less time and can be done in only a couple minutes and helps speed up your computer.
